hero.description: Innovative solutions for modern energy. We connect tradition with the future, creating sustainable energy systems for future generations.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: We are pioneers in the field of renewable energy sources. Our mission is to create a sustainable energy future through innovative technologies and intelligent solutions.
mission.description2: We combine years of experience with the most modern technologies to provide our clients with the best possible solutions for their energy needs.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description1: We believe in the power of renewable energy sources. Our solutions are designed to minimize environmental impact and maximize energy efficiency.
sustainability.description2: We implement every project with regard to long-term sustainability and positive impact on the community and environment.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description1: We constantly invest in research and development of new technologies. Our teams work on solutions that push the boundaries of what is possible in energy.
innovation.description2: We use the most modern technologies including artificial intelligence and machine learning to optimize energy systems.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description1: We believe in the power of cooperation. Our clients are partners for us, with whom we build long-term relationships based on trust and mutual benefit.
partnership.description2: We provide comprehensive support from initial planning to long-term operation and maintenance of energy systems.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We provide comprehensive energy solutions for various types of projects

installation.title: System Installation
installation.description: Complete installation of energy systems with guarantee of quality and reliability.

monitoring.title: Monitoring
monitoring.description: Continuous performance monitoring and optimization of energy systems.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: Preventive and repair maintenance for maximum system lifespan.

contact.title: Are you interested?
contact.subtitle: Contact us and together we will find the best solution for your energy needs

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.partnerDescription: Join us in enhancing the flexibility of the European energy sector through decentralized sources.

mission.title: Industrial Innovation
mission.description1: We develop cutting-edge automation solutions that transform traditional manufacturing into smart, efficient operations.
mission.description2: Our expertise spans from robotics to AI-driven process optimization, delivering measurable improvements in productivity.

sustainability.title: Smart Manufacturing
sustainability.description1: Our solutions reduce waste, optimize energy consumption, and improve overall operational efficiency.
sustainability.description2: We help manufacturers achieve their sustainability goals while maintaining competitive advantage.

hero.title: GENTEC CHP Investment Project
hero.description: Pioneering decentralized energy solutions for Ukraine's sustainable future through advanced cogeneration technology and strategic partnerships.

item1.title: Investment in Ukrainian Energy
item1.description: Strategic opportunities in decentralized power generation and the critical role of cogeneration in Ukraine's energy independence

item2.title: Main Project Parameters
item2.description: Technical specifications, capacity details, and comprehensive infrastructure requirements for successful deployment

item3.title: Location Schema
item3.description: Geographic distribution analysis, site selection methodology, and strategic positioning across Ukrainian territory

investment.title: Investment in Ukrainian Energy
investment.point1: Addresses critical energy infrastructure needs with sustainable, cost-effective solutions.
investment.point2: Deploys state-of-the-art GENTEC CHP cogeneration units (Czech-made) for decentralized electricity and heat generation.
investment.point3: Enhances energy security, reduces transmission losses, and ensures resilient power supply.
investment.point4: Presents an exceptional investment opportunity with a rapid payback period of just 3-4.5 years and attractive long-term returns.

pilotCapacity.title: Pilot Capacity
pilotCapacity.description: 30 MW total installed capacity planned across initial deployment phase

expansion.title: Expansion Phase
expansion.description: 100-150 MW anticipated growth following successful pilot validation

lease.title: Lease Terms
lease.description: 10 years initial term with landowner partnership structure

siteSelection.title: Site Selection
siteSelection.description: ROI 3-4.5 years with comprehensive risk mitigation

location.title: Location Schema for CHP Units
location.description1: Current Pool of Projects: 20 carefully identified locations representing total capacity of 100-200 MW distributed across strategically selected sites throughout Ukraine.
location.description2: Each location has undergone rigorous evaluation encompassing infrastructure accessibility, grid connection capacity, natural gas pipeline proximity, security risk assessment, and economic viability analysis. This methodical approach ensures optimal project performance and minimizes operational risks.
location.description3: Our site selection methodology prioritizes locations with existing utility infrastructure, favorable regulatory environments, and proximity to demand centers, enabling rapid deployment and immediate revenue generation upon commissioning.

financial.title: Vinice Project Financial Analysis
financial.description: Comprehensive financial overview of the investment project with detailed metrics and return analysis.

investment.title: 10 MW Investment
investment.subtitle: €3,2M for 5 MW configuration with complete installation and commissioning

irr.title: IRR (5 years)
irr.subtitle: 82.1% Internal Rate of Return over extended 10-year operational period

equityPayback.title: Equity Payback
equityPayback.subtitle: Years to fully recover initial equity investment from operational cash flows

totalPayback.title: Total Payback
totalPayback.subtitle: Years for complete capital recovery including all debt service obligations

financing.title: Financing Structure
financing.point1: Investor equity: 30% - Reduced capital requirements through leverage
financing.point2: Bank loan or leasing: 70% - 16% interest rate based on current market conditions
financing.point3: EU grants or subsidized loans - Potential additional funding sources available

conclusion.title: Investment Conclusion
conclusion.description: The Vinice project represents an economically attractive and environmentally sustainable investment opportunity featuring stable long-term electricity revenue streams, proven technological reliability from GENTEC's established track record, and significant scalability potential for portfolio expansion across additional Ukrainian locations.

investors.title: Investors
investors.description: Individuals or institutions interested in funding the project and participating in its financial success and long-term benefits.

landOwners.title: Land Owners
landOwners.description: Property owners willing to lease suitable land for the development and operation of renewable energy facilities on a long-term basis.

implementation.title: Implementation Partners
implementation.description: Companies or experts with proven experience in renewable energy construction, technical installation, and efficient operational management.

key.title: Key Partners
key.subtitle: Strategic Alliances for Success
key.description: Our commitment to operational excellence and technological innovation is reflected in strategic partnerships with leading industry organizations, equipment manufacturers, and service providers.
key.finalDescription: These partnerships provide access to MTU engine technology, advanced control systems, comprehensive maintenance support, and established supply chains. Collaboration with local Ukrainian partners ensures regulatory compliance, cultural understanding, and efficient project execution within the local business environment.

cta.title: Ready to Invest in Ukraine's Energy Future?
cta.description: Connect with our investment team to explore opportunities in decentralized power generation. We provide comprehensive support throughout the investment process, from initial feasibility assessment through commercial operation and beyond.

hero.title: Technological containers turnkey
hero.description: Technological containers that we manufacture to measure for the diverse needs of our customers.

description.p1: Our company was founded due to increased demand for technological containers, including but not limited to the energy industry.
description.p2: We manufacture technological containers tailored to customer needs for a wide range of applications with focus on quality and design throughout the entire production cycle.
description.p3: We additionally offer packaging of customer-required technologies.

specifications.title: Technological possibilities of our containers
specifications.capabilities1: We have a welding shop, paint shop and we are able to ensure final assembly of technologies.
specifications.capabilities2: We have our own design and technology department.

twinPack.title: Twin pack 14 meters long
twinPack.description: For a customer in the UK, we manufactured a custom twin pack - two containers connected into one. This is a container with a unique length of more than 14 meters, in which cogeneration units for natural gas are installed: KE-MNG 140 eco and KE-MNG 450 from GENTEC.

biogas.title: Container for biogas plant
biogas.description: As part of one of our orders, we manufactured a container for placing a biogas cogeneration unit for a biogas plant in the Czech Republic. Compact dimensions ensure trouble-free placement in the BPS area.

hero.title: We aggregate flexibility
hero.description: We connect energy with digitalization. Knowledge of market functioning with knowledge of source operation. We connect decentralized sources into virtual power plants.

flexibility.title: Flexibility aggregation
flexibility.description: A modern solution that connects decentralized sources and energy consumers into one system. This reduces dependence on traditional energy sources and increases the stability of the energy grid. It also allows our partners to maximize revenue from energy production and participate in building modern energy.

operation.title: Operation of aggregated blocks and virtual power plants
operation.description: To control aggregated blocks, we use the Virtuel system, which uses elements of artificial intelligence and machine learning. Thanks to the combination of our experience with a smart control system, we are able to perfectly optimize the operation of aggregation blocks and maximize their yield. We specialize in aggregated blocks that mainly combine sources with cogeneration units. Within the group, we deal with their production and service and have long-term experience with their operation in energy systems.

management.title: Management of our own sources and sources of our partners
management.description:
We add both our partners' and customers' sources, as well as our own production facilities, to aggregation blocks. From the outset, we have built the system to be as sophisticated as possible, enabling us to optimally manage our source portfolio. This also serves as a guarantee of quality for our partners and customers.

We manage your sources as carefully as our own.

investment.title: Investment in the construction of flexible energy sources
investment.description:
We therefore invest in the construction of sources that provide flexibility. We focus on the markets of the Czech Republic and Western Europe. Demand for flexibility will grow together with the increasing capacity of renewable energy sources. This is already happening in Western Europe and North America.

This trend is slowly coming to the Czech Republic.

stats.title: 22 MW we aggregate 17 sources we operate we operate
stats.description: Our group aggregates the flexibility of our partners and customers. We connect their sources into virtual power plants and optimize their operation.

services.title: Our services and solutions
services.description1: We provide comprehensive services in the field of flexibility aggregation and energy source management. Our solutions combine modern technologies with many years of experience in energy.
services.description2: We specialize in optimizing the operation of decentralized energy sources and their integration into energy markets.

flexibility.title: Flexibility aggregation
flexibility.content: We connect decentralized energy sources into virtual power plants and optimize their operation on energy markets.

management.title: Source management
management.content: We use advanced algorithms and artificial intelligence for optimal management of your energy sources.

monitoring.title: Monitoring and analysis
monitoring.content: We provide continuous monitoring of source performance and detailed analyses to maximize yields.

investment.title: Investment and development
investment.content: We invest in the construction of new flexible energy sources and support the development of sustainable energy.

description.p1: We connect energy with digitalization. We combine market knowledge with operational expertise in energy resources. Operational optimization and flexible energy delivery represent a modern solution that integrates decentralized energy sources and consumers into a unified system.
description.p2: We are an electricity trader, a settlement entity, and a service provider for the Transmission System Operator (TSO).We operate not only flexible and regulatory sources but also district heating facilities.
description.p3: Our services enable our partners to maximize revenues while contributing to the resilience of the power grid against performance fluctuations, thereby enhancing the safety and reliability of electricity and heat supply.

gentec.title: GENTEC Technology Solutions
gentec.description: Advanced technology solutions for industrial automation and smart manufacturing processes.

ke-mng-500.title: KE-MNG 500
ke-mng-500.description: KE-MNG 500 is a high-efficiency cogeneration unit that is used to generate electricity and heat.

press-conference.title: Press Conference
press-conference.description: Press conference of GENTEC and the company's management.
